xwikidoc.title: Polls application localization
xwikidoc.content: ## ## Home page ## polls.home.title=投票 polls.home.create=新增投票 polls.index.doc.title=投票名 polls.index.type=类型 polls.index.from=开始 polls.index.to=结束 polls.index.doc.creator=发起者 polls.index._actions=操作 ## ## Creation/editing ## polls.create.title=发起新投票 ## Error messages polls.form.error.missingTitle=标题为强制项 polls.form.error.missingOptions=请至少选择两项 polls.form.error.missingQuestion=投票问题为强制项 polls.form.error.missingVoteType=投票类型为强制项 polls.form.error.missingRatingLevel=评分投票的最大评分等级是必须的，并必须大于0且最多为{0}。 polls.form.error.missingOpenDate=投票开始日期是强制性的，必须具有格式{0}。 polls.form.error.missingCloseDate=投票截止日期是强制性的，必须具有格式{0}。 polls.form.error.wrongDateOrder=投票截止日期必须在开启日期之后。 ## Section titles polls.form.section.general=你的投票 polls.form.section.options=选项 polls.form.section.voteType=投票类型 polls.form.section.timeline=时间线 polls.form.section.votes=投票 ## Fiels labels polls.form.label.space=哪里： polls.form.label.title=标题 polls.form.label.allOptions=每行一个，输入所有选项 polls.form.label.optionCount.multiple=最多选项次数 polls.form.label.optionCount.multiple.details=只允许多重选择与加权多重选择 polls.form.label.optionCount.separator=或者 polls.form.label.optionCount.rating=最大额定值（最小值为0，额定值可以从0 \= 最低，到最大值） polls.form.label.optionCount.rating.details=只能评分 polls.form.label.timeline=投票期 polls.form.label.timeline.dateFormat=(日期格式：{0}) ## Tools polls.form.tools.delete=[删除] polls.form.tools.delete.tooltip=删除 polls.form.tools.move=[移动] polls.form.tools.move.tooltip=拖放以更改顺序 polls.form.tools.addOption=新增一个选项 ## Form actions polls.form.actions.create=创建投票 polls.form.actions.cancel=取消 ## ## Viewing/voting ## ## Voting instructions ### Missing: polls.vote.instructions.single=Choose one of the options below. ### Missing: polls.vote.instructions.multiple=Choose at least 1 and at most {0} of the options below. ### Missing: polls.vote.instructions.weighted=Assign non-zero percentages to at least 1 and at most {0} of the options below. The sum must be 100%. ### Missing: polls.vote.instructions.rating=Rate from 0 (least favorable) to {0} (most favorable) each one of the options. ### Missing: polls.vote.instructions.ranking.noscript=Use the "move up/move down" tools to reorder the items according to your preference (higher is better). ### Missing: polls.vote.instructions.ranking.script=Drag and drop the items to reorder them according to your preference (higher is better). ## Timeline ### Missing: polls.vote.timeline.notOpen=This poll is not open yet. It will be available from {0} to {1}. ### Missing: polls.vote.timeline.ongoing=This poll is open from {0} to {1}. ### Missing: polls.vote.timeline.closed=This poll is now closed. ## Voting form ### Missing: polls.vote.label.voted=You answered: polls.vote.actions.vote=提交 polls.vote.actions.updateVote=更新答案 polls.vote.actions.cancel=前往投票主页 ## Tools ### Missing: polls.vote.tools.moveup=[move up] ### Missing: polls.vote.tools.moveup.tooltip=Move up ### Missing: polls.vote.tools.movedown=[move down] ### Missing: polls.vote.tools.movedown.tooltip=Move down ### Missing: polls.vote.tools.incValue=Increase value by 1 ### Missing: polls.vote.tools.decValue=Decrease value by 1 ## Error messages ### Missing: polls.vote.warning.unauthorized=You must be logged-in and have proper rights on this document in order to vote. ### Missing: polls.vote.error.single.noneSelected=Please choose one of the options below. polls.vote.error.multiple.noneSelected=请至少选择一个选项 ### Missing: polls.vote.error.multiple.wrongSelectedNumber=Please choose at least one and at most {0} of the options below. ### Missing: polls.vote.error.weighted.wrongSelectedNumber=Please assign non-zero weights to at most {0} of the options. ### Missing: polls.vote.error.weighted.wrongTotalWeight=Please assign weights that sum up to 100. The sum of your current weight assignments is {0}. ### Missing: polls.vote.error.rating.optionMissing=Please select a rating for each option. ### Missing: polls.vote.error.rating.ratingOutOfRange=Rating out of range for option {0}. ### Missing: polls.vote.error.ranking.unknownElement=Invalid order: unknown element {0}. ### Missing: polls.vote.error.ranking.duplicateElement=Invalid order: duplicate element {0}. ## Results polls.vote.results.title.before= ### Missing: polls.vote.results.title.during=Intermediate results ### Missing: polls.vote.results.title.after=Results ### Missing: polls.vote.results.participants={0} participant{0,choice,0#s|1#|1<s} ### Missing: polls.vote.results.chart.percentage=Percentage ### Missing: polls.vote.results.chart.voteCount=Number of votes ### Missing: polls.vote.results.chart.columnsNumberWarning=Only the first {0} columns can be displayed in the chart. ### Missing: polls.vote.results.table.option=Option ### Missing: polls.vote.results.table.percentage=Percentage ### Missing: polls.vote.results.table.percentageVoters=Percentage of voters ### Missing: polls.vote.results.table.voteCount=Number of votes ### Missing: polls.vote.results.table.voters=Chosen by ### Missing: polls.vote.results.table.average=Average ## ## Document version log ## polls.versionSummary.pollCreated=投票创建 polls.versionSummary.optionAdded=投票选项成功添加 polls.versionSummary.userVoted={0} 投票 ## ## Class translations ## Polls.PollClass_type_single=单选 Polls.PollClass_type_multiple=多选 Polls.PollClass_type_weighted=加权多项选择 Polls.PollClass_type_rating=评分 Polls.PollClass_type_ranking=排行 Polls.PollClass_question=问题 Polls.PollClass_optionsPerVoter=每个投票者的最多选项数量 Polls.PollClass_type=选择类型 Polls.PollClass_from=来自 ### Missing: Polls.PollClass_to=to
